/circle6 Using plain water and soap, apply soap and lather thoroughly up to the elbow.
/circle6 Always keep the elbows dependent, i.e. lower than your hands.
/lozenge6 Rub for a minimum of 10â€“15 seconds. 
/lozenge6 Clean under the fi  ngernails with a soft   brush. 
/lozenge6 If running water is not available, use a bucket and pitcher. Do not dip your hands 
into a bowl to rinse, as this re-contaminates your hands.
/circle6 Close the tap with your elbow.
